submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(colors)
        colors.extend(colors[:k-1])  # Extend the array to handle the circular nature
        
        ans = 0
        size = 1  # Initialize the size of the current alternating sequence
        
        for i in range(1, len(colors)):
            if colors[i] != colors[i-1]:  # If the current color is different from the previous one
                size += 1
                if size == k:  # If the size of the current sequence is equal to k
                    ans += 1
                    size -= 1  # Slide the window by 1
            else:
                size = 1  # Reset the size if the sequence breaks

        return ans
